mapper.select: select count(*) from offer where user_id=#{myid}

select offer.user_id as user_id, offer.company_id as company_id, offer.notice_num as notice_num, offer.content as content, company.name as name, company.major as major, company.logo as logo from offer join company on offer.company_id=company.id
select * from company order by rand()
select * from offer a where user_id = #{user_id} and company_id = #{company_id}
select user.*, resume.num, resume.job, resume.career, resume.introduce from user join resume on user.id = resume.user_id
